item.title: Trees require pruning, 3rd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexandra Crescent, Plaistow, London

item.title: In the road just north of Kentish Town Library on southbound side, 3rd November
item.description:
